name: Jolty Trail
description:
This is a driving game where you drive up a mountain. There are various roadblocks on your way like potholes, water puddles and rocks. If you hit them your car stops to repair the lost tire or exhaust (or broken engine) but the replaced part is more powerful.

You have to decide if you dodge these obstacles and reach your goal in one flow or if you tactically make accidents to gain new top speed.

In what time will you reach the top of the mountain?
